body_html: See https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Reduction-dtype-notes for notes comparing our reduction functions to numpy's. This PR implements the "Integer Upcast" cases; we should also implement "Integer Upcast to Float" at some point (so e.g. mean will return a floating point type).
body_text: See https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Reduction-dtype-notes for notes comparing our reduction functions to numpy's.  This PR implements the "Integer Upcast" cases; we should also implement "Integer Upcast to Float" at some point (so e.g. mean will return a floating point type).
body: See https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Reduction-dtype-notes for notes comparing our reduction functions to numpy's.  This PR implements the "Integer Upcast" cases; we should also implement "Integer Upcast to Float" at some point (so e.g. mean will return a floating point type).
